column3: “When I got a 1/4th of this, the nuggets were packed so tight that it fit in a standard 1/8th size capsule--because of that, I was able to appreciate the aroma, which places me in the middle of some vivid pine forest. It's the type of smell that warrants a close your eyes and inhale".

column1: The overall look is as follows: short yet wide
column2: dense buds that are pale grey in color
column3: yielding plentiful trichomes that can be illu...”"

“Experience: Strong from the get-go. Her kisses leave a tingle in the nose, mouth, and tongue. Yes, yes! 

Usage: Will have you exhibiting sweet-ass dance moves around the house, cats be damned!

Look/Feel: Large white crystals cover the buds along with abundant orange/brown hairs. 

Scent: Touches of Tobacco, with sweet rich tannins, like a fine cabernet. Leaves your mouth watering. Also has hints of green tea, with ...”
“Beast Mode......... So god like”

“I give this smoke a strong 5. Beastmode OG for President!!!
Just a few hits puts you right where you need to be.”

“holy mind fucking onex platypus!) I'm standing in my kitchen with the most wooden spoon you can find in my hand and a tortellini on the stove in a pot. my body knows holy god damning mind fuck I'm high"”"
“Perfectly suited name! Excellent strain! Definitely one of my new favorites. A life saver for my back pain, and it didn't take much at all. Had me happy and smiling in no time!”
“Great strain if your looking to be relaxed. and just like beast mode this flower will run you over.”
“It's probably the best strain I've ever had”
“some good chronic, strong stuff, fucked with my head a little though. Be careful if you have anxiety, this strain is not for you.”
“beastmode is the truth started sweating after one hit”
“Ahhhhhhhhh!!!! I just ran five blocks after smoking this and now I'm about to run through a wall! Ahhhhhhh beast mode!!!!! Seahawks!”
“Perfectly suited name! Excellent strain. It was exactly what I needed for my back pain. I also felt very happy during my lengthy high. Quickly became a new favorite!”

“Got some beast mode og by red label. Doesn’t look that great because it’s outdoor and was on the low shelf. Effects are amazingly strong but not enjoying the speedy thoughts, some tense nerves, and talkativeness in the beginning. What was good was the strong relaxation in body and mind. Mind is calm and happy. Smoke had expanded decently strong during inhale and stayed consistent through exhale. Good long cough. Tast...”

“I never needed very much of this strain to get me where I wanted. I get a very active mind but at the same time I zone out and relax. Perfect for a late night hangout or to help you catch some solid Zzz's.”
“Interesting Hybrid.  Very strong strain. Definitely feel that Stoney OG high, but there is an alert Sativa-ness to it as well, all adding up to a potent  mix of sensations.”

“Oh my GODDDDDD

I peeled myself off of the face of the planet Pluto to write this 

When I first took a hit I felt like someone was drowning in a neon-lit purple pool,

Then it felt like someone hit me in the jaw with a rake, 

Then I absorbed most of my environment's energy, received Beast Mode, and wrote this review 

Enjoy the most trippy experience one could desire”
“Interesting Hybrid.  Very strong strain. Definitely feel that Stoney OG high, but there is an alert Sativa-ness to it as well, all adding up to a potent  mix of sensations.”
“euphoric, ecstatic, deep thought inducing down into the body and up high into the sky high.”
“Heavy every time.....😲”

“Og kush phenotype with a light sativa mood uplifting boost. Not the best for concentration and had me giggling at a couple of jokes at some point. This will leave you feeling your mood elevated and  recharged.”
“Gives you the energetic mind boost, but keeps you physically mellow. Good day time strain. Too much of it, you might start to feel dizzy.”

“Picked up a half Oz of this today and rolled a j. within 5 mins it smacked me HARD!! My legs felt like jelly while walking and mind was coasting on autopilot. It has an earthy taste with a pine exhale and smooth on the lungs. This goes in my top 5 for sure.”
“Very good at relieving stress and pain. Nice flavor.”
“Love this strain! It's a real fire hybrid. Really mellows you out with out putting your ass on the couch.Good strain to watch tv, listen to music, or play video games with.”
“Love this strain! It's a real fire hybrid. Really mellows you out with out putting your ass on the couch.Good strain to watch tv, listen to music, or play video games with.”
“If your not careful to not pull On it too Hard while smoking its possible to throw up after a Pull.”
“The Best Strain yet! took my pain away....”
“WOW. It doesnt take a lot.”
“I thought this strain was straight forward. smelled strong but didn't smoke the same. Pretty mellow afternoon high.”
“I like the taste.  I got the red label and it hit the spot. Just what I needed to get my day started.”
“High didn't last long. Not a good taste and smells like balls.”
“really weak... not a fun high or useful one. Not terrible, but not as good for me as I had hoped.”
“Didn't like this. The high was short. The weed smells like balls. Boooo.”
